      • run

        public void run()
         throws FsSyncException
        Invokes sync() on all managed file system controllers which are accepted by the configured file system controller filter.

        The implementation uses an FsSyncExceptionBuilder while iterating over all managed file system controllers in order to ensure that all controllers get synced, even if a controller fails with an FsSyncException.

        Throws:
        FsSyncWarningException - if only warning conditions apply. This implies that the respective file system controller has been sync()ed with constraints, e.g. if an open archive entry stream or channel gets forcibly closed.
        FsSyncException - if any error conditions apply.
